review_comment: Kids loved the playground and swimming pool.

Loved the spa and lakeside view.

Food needs improvement.
Room was hot because AC didn’t work well.
Smell in the room was terrible.
Peaceful and relaxing by the lake.
Very polite employees.
Needs more variety.
Internet was extremely slow.
Green compound and fresh air.
Clean rooms and comfy bed.
Service was normal, nothing special.
Could hear music from nearby places.
Loved the sunsets by the lake.
Hot water didn’t work and toilet smelled.
Beautiful compound and good rooms.
